biotools.summary: This tool performs, in a systematic way, an automated analysis of regular arrangements in organisms having multiple chromosomes, for different transcription factors (or regulators, conditions) at the same time. It reports and allows identification of periodic regions of target genes for the different conditions, on each chromosome.

bioschemas.name: GREAT:SCAN:multipatterns
bioschemas.summary: This tool performs, in a systematic way, an automated analysis of regular arrangements in organisms having multiple chromosomes, for different transcription factors (or regulators, conditions) at the same time. It reports and allows identification of periodic regions of target genes for the different conditions, on each chromosome.
